channel.title: math on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in math on Vinod Kurup

item.title: On Factoring Large Numbers
item.description: I wonder how many of my blog posts are based on stories from This American Life. Probably not enough. Every time I start to listen to a show, I’m certain that I’m not going to be interested and within a minute I’m trapped and can’t stop listening. It’s that good. A recent show was about people who people who pursued crazy ideas. The first story was about a mathematician named Frank Nelson Cole.
